hero.title: Pikku
hero.subtitle: One Function, Every Protocol
hero.description: Write TypeScript functions once, trigger them via HTTP, WebSocket, cron jobs, queues, and more. Pikku is the swiss knife for building scalable applications with full type safety.
features: Same function can handle RPC, HTTP, SSE, WebSocket, CronJobs, Queues, and MCP
Auto-generated mini TypeScript SDKs with complete type safety
Deploy anywhere - Express, Lambda, Cloudflare, Next.js, Azure and more

typeSafety.title: Full Type Safety from Server to Client
typeSafety.description: Write once, get TypeScript autocomplete everywhere

benefits.title: Instant Feedback
benefits.description: See type errors as you type

typeSafety.demoNote: Demo GIF will show live TypeScript intellisense flowing from server function definitions to client usage

coreFeatures.title: Built for Developers
coreFeatures.description: Pikku provides everything you need to build robust, type-safe applications with minimal setup.

features.title: Fully Typed
features.description: Complete type safety from server to client with automatic type generation

features.title: Auth & Permissions
features.description: Built-in authentication, sessions, and granular permission system

features.title: Middleware
features.description: Hook into your functions with middleware for logging, custom validation, and more

features.title: Service Injection
features.description: Simple dependency injection without decorators or magic

architectureFlexibility.title: Monoliths, Services, Functions, you can have it all
architectureFlexibility.description: Build your application architecture your way with Pikku's flexible approach to deployment and bundling.

features.title: Minimal Bundle Generation
features.description: Tree-shake all the services your code doesn't need for optimal bundle sizes

features.title: Service Filtering
features.description: Pick and choose which services you want to deploy by filtering via tag, files or transport type

features.title: Functionless Optimised
features.description: Select a single function to deploy via Lambda/Cloudflare and let Pikku pluck out the core dependencies

runAnywhere.title: Deploy Anywhere, Scale Everywhere
runAnywhere.description: From serverless functions to traditional servers, from SQS Lambda queues to serverless WebSockets - your Pikku code runs everywhere without modification.

deploymentTypes.title: Serverless First
deploymentTypes.description: AWS Lambda, Cloudflare Workers, Vercel Functions - deploy with zero configuration

deploymentTypes.title: Traditional Servers
deploymentTypes.description: Express, Fastify, Next.js - integrate with existing applications seamlessly

deploymentTypes.title: Custom Runtimes
deploymentTypes.description: Build your own runtime adapter for any environment or platform

finalMessage.title: It's all an adapter away
finalMessage.description: Pikku glues together the pieces you need, so you can build an adaptor to run in any environment.
